  1. In the Spotlight
     The latest information from your fire district

  1. TVF&R Will Ask Voters to Renew Local Option Levy for Emergency Services

    Measure 34-286 proposes a renewal of TVF&R’s existing levy rate at 45 cents per $1,000 of assessed valuation for five more years to maintain emergency response services and personnel hired since 2000. Voters will see the measure on the May 21 ballot. Read on...

  1. TVF&R Crews Extinguish a Fire at an Energy Storage Integrator Business in Tualatin

    The first-arriving engine company reported smoke showing from a large roll-up door. An initial report from the business occupant said the business was performing a new product test on six large lithium-ion batteries, and the batteries were on fire. Read on...

  1. Meeting Provides Community Resources Following Villebois Fire

    Approximately 250 Villebois neighbors joined Tualatin Valley Fire & Rescue, the City of Wilsonville, and Wilsonville Police Department Tuesday night for a community meeting. They learned about available resources, which are included in this article. Read on...
